banana peel.instruction: Place in green bin or compost.

vegetable scraps.instruction: Place in green bin or compost.
vegetable scraps.tip: Use kitchen composters for best results.

paper.instruction: Place in blue bin for recycling.

plastic bottle.instruction: Rinse and place in blue bin.

used battery.tip: Never throw batteries in regular trash.

medicine.instruction: Return to pharmacy or hazardous waste center.
